vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: bool public frozen = false;
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 internal totalSupply_;
vulnerability_findings.message:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (BasicToken.sol#93) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (BasicToken.sol#102-104)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint8 public decimals;
vulnerability_findings.message:
BasicToken.decimals should be constant (BasicToken.sol#96)
BasicToken.frozen should be constant (BasicToken.sol#97)
BasicToken.name should be constant (BasicToken.sol#94)
BasicToken.symbol should be constant (BasicToken.sol#95)
BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (BasicToken.sol#93)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function totalSupply() public view returns (uint256);
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.totalSupply (BasicToken.sol#12) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:

vulnerability_findings.message: BasicToken.totalSupply (BasicToken.sol#102-104) should be declared external
